doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records

This series consists of materials created and collected by the NYFA Board of Directors during the time period 1971-2007. Materials include by-laws, memorandum, meeting agendas, and correspondence created by board members; development materials documenting the creation of NYFA programs, such as Artists-in-Residence; and committee reports documenting the activities of the Finance, Planning, Nominating, and Executive committees. This series also contains records created and collected by former NYFA Executive Ted Berger, including meeting notes, correspondence, and reports documenting Berger's contributions in developing and strengthening NYFA's mission.
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
